nodes.title: A Dusty Road
text: You walk along a dusty country road toward the small town of Redcrest.
The afternoon sun hangs low, and the wind smells of wildflowers and distant smoke.

nodes.title: Ambush!
text: The road narrows as it cuts between two steep embankments.
A rustle in the brush is the only warning you get before crude arrows hiss through the air.

choices.label: Dive for cover and hope to avoid the worst of it.

skill_check.description: You hurl yourself toward the roadside ditch.

nodes.title: Goblin Skirmish
text: Four goblins burst from the brush with wicked grins and rusty blades.

choices.label: Brace yourself and continue the fight.

nodes.title: Aftermath
text: The last goblin falls with a surprised gurgle.
You stand among the bodies, breathing hard, the road to Redcrest quiet once more.

nodes.title: The End
text: Your vision goes dark as you collapse to the ground.
The goblins' cruel laughter is the last sound you hear.

nodes.title: Redcrest Awaits
text: Battered but alive, you see the wooden palisade of Redcrest rising ahead.
Whatever awaits within those walls, you have survived your first challenge on the road.
